articles.title: Billie Eilish Apologizes for Using Asian Slur in Recently Surfaced Video - TMZ
articles.description: Billie Eilish is both apologizing for and clarifying a recent video that surfaced of the singer using an Asian slur and seemingly mocking Asian accents ... saying the clip isn't entirely as it appears.

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Ex-Nigeria coach Siasia football ban reduced to five years by Cas - Goal.com
articles.description: UEFA opposes Germany's plan of illuminating the outside of Allianz Arena with rainbow lighting on Wednesday vs Hungary, a DFB spokesman has said, meaning Die Mannschaft might not be able to show support for the LGBT+ community.

articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: 'Tough' Kai Sotto impresses Tab Baldwin after first Gilas Pilipinas stint - Rappler
articles.description: Kai Sotto, 19, holds his own against more experienced foes as he helps Gilas Pilipinas sweep the FIBA Asia Cup Qualifiers
articles.content: Sotto's finest game numbers-wise came in their stunning 81-78 victory over Korea, where he churned out 11 points, 7 rebounds, 2 assists, and 1 steal in only 18 minutes.
